TextBlock.Text: Dorum: Yakan is the inventor of the Nomai Quantum Music Player. (NQMP or 'Enkyump')
Dorum: His idea was to elevate the music listening experience by switching the track played if the device detects the user is no longer paying attention.
Dorum: While praised for its quality, the Enkyump ended up a commercial failure, most users stating they prefered active control over their music.
